short_description:
[ In process of completing project for distribution.  Nothing here but screenshots so far.  Hope to have it ready by August 1, 2014. ]

I created the Help Give Thanks Research Project Solutions to allow anyone to test and benefit from Walter Freeman’s brain research, Daniel Gilbert’s happiness research, and the research of Jacob Bronowski, Jason Brown, James Burke, Paul Cisek, Stanley Greenspan, Molly Shaffer Van Houweling, Benjamin Libet, Lawrence Lessig, Robert Lustig, Leonard Mlodinow, Jeffrey Schwartz, Stuart Shanker, Edward Tufte, Willem Vanderburg, Margaret Visser, Paul Watzlawick, and many, many, many, others!

Learn more about these amazing people, why your are equally amazing, and more about the Help Give Thanks Research Project at the link below.

Cheers!

David Matson

NOTE: To see screenshots full size, right click on them (in Firefox) and select 'view image' from the popup menu that appears.
